API Reference

Core Functions

htmlToMarkdown(html, options)

Convert HTML string to Markdown.

import { htmlToMarkdown } from 'mdream'

const markdown = htmlToMarkdown('<h1>Hello</h1>', {
  origin: 'https://example.com'
})

streamHtmlToMarkdown(stream, options)

Convert HTML stream to Markdown stream.

import { streamHtmlToMarkdown } from 'mdream'

const markdownStream = streamHtmlToMarkdown(htmlStream, {
  chunkSize: 4096
})

generateLlmsTxtArtifacts(options)

Generate llms.txt artifacts from HTML files.

import { generateLlmsTxtArtifacts } from 'mdream/llms-txt'

const result = await generateLlmsTxtArtifacts({
  patterns: 'dist/**/*.html',
  siteName: 'My Site',
  description: 'Site description',
  generateFull: true
})

Types

ConversionOptions

interface ConversionOptions {
  origin?: string
  chunkSize?: number
  plugins?: Plugin[]
}

LlmsTxtOptions

interface LlmsTxtOptions {
  patterns: string | string[]
  siteName: string
  description: string
  origin?: string
  output?: string
  generateFull?: boolean
}
